siteMetadata.about: A software engineer based in Brazil who builds  applications and websites.
siteMetadata.author: Vandré Leal
siteMetadata.intro: See bits and pieces on GitHub, packages on npm, thoughts on Medium, and a full resume on LinkedIn.
siteMetadata.title: Vandré Leal - Software Engineer

company.name: AvantStay
company.description: where I work with JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Next.js, MobX, GraphQL, Storybook, and CSS-in-JS.

work.interests: I think about code organization more than I would like to admit and have been using principles of Atomic Design for component hierarchy, CSS-in-JS for styling and Storybook for visual testing.

frontmatter.description: Coding challenge for AvantStay, the next generation hospitality platform redefining the way in which people travel.
frontmatter.title: AvantStay Challenge

frontmatter.description: Mapeaks is a Shopify embedded app that helps merchants understand how their products are being distributed by showing the geolocation of orders.
frontmatter.title: Mapeaks

frontmatter.description: SentiNEO is a Near-Earth Objects viewer that leverages the data from NASA APIs to retrieve both the APOD and the list of NEO close approaches.
frontmatter.title: SentiNEO

frontmatter.description: Oxidizer is an asynchronous Rust ORM based on tokio-postgres and refinery. Two powerful libraries that give performance and reliability to perform database interactions.
frontmatter.title: Oxidizer

frontmatter.description: Runlet is a cloud-based manager that provides a friendly interface to manage jobs across connected devices.
frontmatter.title: Runlet

frontmatter.description: Dracula is a color scheme for code editors and terminal emulators such as Fluent Terminal, iTerm, and VSCode.
frontmatter.title: Dracula: Fluent

frontmatter.description: Space Fleet is a dark syntax Atom theme that pairs up nicely with the One Dark UI theme bundled with Atom.
frontmatter.title: Space Fleet

frontmatter.description: Museek displays Last.fm user statistics including Top Artists, Top Albums, Top Tracks, and Recent Tracks.
frontmatter.title: Museek
